title: Architectural projection - means a chajja, cornice etc
clause_text: Architectural projection - means a chajja, cornice etc. which is a protrusion from the building facade or line of the building only for aesthetic purpose and not used for any habitable purpose. Access - means a clear approach to a plot or a building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
